item.title: Quote: Organizing Code to Allow for Easy Changes
item.description: Organizing Code to Allow for Easy Changes Asserting that code should be easy to change is akin to stating that children should be polite; the statement is impossible to disagree with yet it in no way helps a parent raise an agreeable child.
